sourcesContent:
<template>
    <canvas id="canvas" width="1024" height="256" class="dmd-canvas-main"></canvas>
</template>

<script>
//import  { fabric }  from 'fabric';
import * as PIXI from 'pixi.js';

export default {
  name: 'MainDmd',
  props: {
    plane0: Uint8Array,
    plane1: Uint8Array,
    shouldBlend: Boolean
  },
  methods: {
    drawImage() {
        if(this.shouldBlend) {
            //this.drawBlendedImage(this.plane0,this.plane1);
            this.drawRealisticImage(this.plane0,this.plane1);
        } else {
            console.log(this.plane0);
            this.draw1bitImage(this.plane0);
        }
    },
    drawBlendedImage(plane0Data,plane1Data) {
        const canvas = document.querySelector("#canvas");
        let ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");
        let imageData = ctx.createImageData(128,32);
        let counter = 0;
        for(let i=0; i<imageData.data.length; i += 4) {
            const color = this.bitToRGBRowsBlended(plane0Data,plane1Data,counter);
            imageData.data[i] = color*187 +33;
            imageData.data[i+1] = color*100 +33;
            imageData.data[i+2] = 33;//color;
            imageData.data[i+3] = 255;
            counter++;
        }
        console.log(plane0Data);
        ctx.putImageData(imageData,0,0);
    },
    drawRealisticImage(plane0Data,plane1Data) {
        const dot = require('@/assets/graphics/dmd-sprites/plasma/3.svg');
        const planedata = [plane0Data,plane1Data]
        console.log(planedata);

        ////////////////////////

        const app = new PIXI.Application({ background: '#1099bb' });
document.body.appendChild(app.view);

const container = new PIXI.Container();

app.stage.addChild(container);

// Create a new texture
const texture = PIXI.Texture.from(dot);

// Create a 5x5 grid of bunnies
for (let i = 0; i < 25; i++) {
    const bunny = new PIXI.Sprite(texture);
    bunny.anchor.set(0.5);
    bunny.x = (i % 5) * 40;
    bunny.y = Math.floor(i / 5) * 40;
    container.addChild(bunny);
}

// Move container to the center
container.x = app.screen.width / 2;
container.y = app.screen.height / 2;

// Center bunny sprite in local container coordinates
container.pivot.x = container.width / 2;
container.pivot.y = container.height / 2;

// Listen for animate update
app.ticker.add((delta) => {
    // rotate the container!
    // use delta to create frame-independent transform
    container.rotation -= 0.01 * delta;
});


        /*
        var canvas = new fabric.Canvas('canvas');
        var group = [];
        const planedata = [plane0Data,plane1Data]
        console.log(planedata);
        const dotPath = require('@/assets/graphics/dmd-sprites/plasma/3.svg');
        fabric.loadSVGFromURL(dotPath,function() {
            for(let i=0; i<plane0Data.length; i++) {
                const loadedObjects = new fabric.Group(group);
                //let color = 1//this.bitToRGBRows(plane0Data,i);
                const xPos = (i%128)*8;
                const yPos = (i/32)*8;
                //if(color == 1) {
                    loadedObjects.set({
                        left: xPos,
                        top: yPos,
                        width:8,
                        height:8
                    });
                    canvas.add(loadedObjects);
                //}
            }
            canvas.renderAll();
        },function(item, object) {
                object.set('id',item.getAttribute('id'));
                group.push(object);
        });
        */
    },
    draw1bitImage(plane0Data) {
        const canvas = document.querySelector("#canvas");
        let ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");
        let imageData = ctx.createImageData(128,32);
        let counter = 0;
        for(let i=0; i<imageData.data.length; i += 4) {
            let color = this.bitToRGBRows(plane0Data,counter);
            //if(plane1Data != null) {
            //    color = bitToRGBRowsBlended(plane0Data,plane1Data,counter);
            //}
            imageData.data[i] = color*187 +33;
            imageData.data[i+1] = color*100 +33;
            imageData.data[i+2] = 33;//color;
            imageData.data[i+3] = 255;
            counter++;
        }
        console.log(plane0Data);
        ctx.putImageData(imageData,0,0);
    },
    bitToRGBRows(planeData,index) {
        const width = 128;
        const col = index % width;
        const byte = Math.floor(index/8);
        const bitPos = (col % 8);
        const bit =  ( planeData[byte] & 0xFF ) >>(bitPos) & 1;
        return bit;
    },
    bitToRGBRowsBlended(plane0Data,plane1Data,index) {
        const width = 128;
        const col = index % width;
        const byte = Math.floor(index/8);
        const bitPos = (col % 8);
        const plane0Bit =  ( plane0Data[byte] & 0xFF ) >>(bitPos) & 1;
        const plane1Bit =  ( plane1Data[byte] & 0xFF ) >>(bitPos) & 1;
        let colorVal = plane0Bit * 0.67 + plane1Bit * 0.33;
        return colorVal;
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.drawImage();
  }
}

</script>

<style scoped>

#canvas {
    position: absolute;
    top:100px;
    margin-top: 100px;
}

</style>
